name: ModifyEnvironmentFileSystem
description:
Partially update a file system environment in a project.

Use this tool to update specific fields of a file system environment in a given project within Datadog. It should be called when modifications are needed for an existing environment's file system settings.

parameters.name: file_system_id
parameters.description: A UUID string that uniquely identifies the specific file system to be updated.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this file system.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the project you want to modify. Use the endpoint `/api/projects/` to retrieve this ID if unknown.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: file_system_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details to update in the file system environment, such as ID, path, depth, type, meta information, and more.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this file system.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this file system.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
